doc.title: NothingFace
doc.plot: After an hallucinatory visit to the Dentist, Jobe discovers a robot friend. But when Jobe is suddenly struck by a vehicle, his world is changed. Jobe is followed by the NothingFaces and is thrown into a vehicle and taken to a mental asylum. It is here that Jobe is witness to horrific tortures and absolute truth. Jobe attempts his escape only to wonder further into the labyrinth of the damned. Then Jobe is confronted by the head doctor, where Jobe discovers why he is really there!
